docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation of Deplatformer. Here you will find step by step instructions to start using deplatformer and guides to perform common tasks within the Deplatformer interface.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Getting Started Follow the instructions below to get started using deplatformer. Installation Deplatformer can be installed using pip or from source directly. Note that pip will install the latest version published in the Python Package Index, whereas installing from source gives full flexibility as to which version will be installed. Install using pip To install using pip make sure you have pip, and Python of at least version 3.7 already installed in your enviroment. Install Deplatformer package by running: pip install deplatformer-webapp Install from source To install from source clone the repository in your machine: git clone https://github.com/deplatformer/deplatformer-webapp
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Follow the instructions below to get started using deplatformer.

docs.text: Deplatformer can be installed using pip or from source directly. Note that pip will install the latest version published in the Python Package Index, whereas installing from source gives full flexibility as to which version will be installed.

docs.text: To install using pip make sure you have pip, and Python of at least version 3.7 already installed in your enviroment. Install Deplatformer package by running: pip install deplatformer-webapp

docs.text: To install from source clone the repository in your machine: git clone https://github.com/deplatformer/deplatformer-webapp
